TopicTitle: My first dive into modding with plugins: LudicrousParts (I know, very "creative" name)

Articles.Content:
Here is the spacedock link for anyone wanting to try it out: https://spacedock.info/mod/3108/LudicrousParts

The source code: https://github.com/HyperFunOriginal/LudicrousPartsMod

Not much else to say other than, enjoy!

 

Edited September 3, 2022 by HyperFun

I know that some of the part models look... for the lack of a better word: atrocious.

That's because I'm a dum-dum and don't know how to model parts well.

[please spare me the pitchforks for those complaints]

9 minutes ago, HyperFun said:

please spare me the pitchforks for those complaints

Anyone who take the time to learn how to do this deserves only praise.  As you do it more your skills will greatly increase.  Fly safe

Thanks for those encouraging words there!

Unrelated to these posts, how do I change my username to LudicrousFun? (as people more commonly refer to me as such now)

7 minutes ago, HyperFun said:

how do I change my username to LudicrousFun?

Make a request in this forum;

How long does it take on average for mods to be added to CKAN btw, because it's been a good week or two and I still don't see it listed. So just wondering if that's normal

Makes sense why it'd take a while to sort out though.

Edited September 9, 2022 by LudicrousFun

Hi there.

A list of your added parts and some pics of your parts would nice so that people could have some idea what they would be downloading.

Hope it goes well for you.

Thank you.

Currently mod is in early-alpha, so changes can occur frequently that are not backwards-compatible.

Parts:

  1.  AH-3000 Anti-hydrogen Propulsion System: An antimatter propulsion system as the name suggests. Ridiculously powerful, but ridiculously risky.
  2. Anti-Tank System Antihydrogen Tank: An antimatter tank to pair with the part above. Stores anti-hydrogen which explodes when tank is not powered or unable to cope with the acceleration. Upon explosion creates very lethal shrapnel. Ridiculously expensive.
  3. NX(n)-1.875m Intermediate Size Fuel Tank: A series of fuel tanks that are equivalent to the FT-(n)00 tanks but 1.875m bulk size instead. Fragile.
  4. HYDROX Water containment device: A somewhat useless part, entirely for thermoregulation using water.
  5. S-1x1 Glass Panel: A simple transparent glass panel. Nothing much to say.

Modifiers:

  1. All tanks containing LiquidFuel, Oxidizer or Monopropellant now has the LiquidTank module, simulating tank pressure and internals.
  2. Enables tweakscale for all parts for the Tweakscale Continued mod. Disable if you think it's too hacky.

Plugins:

  1. Antimatter Tank module: (Explained in Parts, point 2)
  2. LiquidTank module (Explained in Modifiers, point 1)
  3. Shrapnel Generator: Generates shrapnel flying out in all directions.
  4. Warning Display: Displays if something (in this plugin) on your ship is about to go wrong.
  5. ConfigInfo: Runtime configurations and behind-the-scenes stuff.

Dependencies:

  1. Module Manager
  2. KSP 1.8.1+ (1.8.1 works best since I am developping in 1.8.1)

Optional Extras:

  1. TweakScale

Known Incompatibilities:

  1.  Procedural Parts: Due to indeterminate tank contents until launch (I could fix that, but that'll break a lot of things as well.)

 

Hopefully that explains most of it.

Edited September 9, 2022 by LudicrousFun
